title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase
items.body: So soft, had to steam to get the wrinkles out from packaging. Runs a little bit on the larger size but I like the look. Read more
items.author: Debby

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Soft Cardigan
items.body: This is a nice cardigan, it’s very soft, light weight, so not a bulky cardigan has a nice style and the color is great for fall/winter although you could actually wear it any time of the year. I found that the buttons were a bit difficult to get through the button holes with the first few wears, they did seem to stretch a bit with use. The cardigan pairs very well with jeans, leggings, or even work attire. I ordered an XL and the fit was perfect, the sleeves were the right size as well for the size of the sweater. I think it’s a good value for the money, and would recommend. Read more
items.author: Dorothy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs BIG
items.body: Super soft, nice quality and pretty, but it runs extremely large and long. It is also very stretchy which i love, but it contributes to the awkwardly oversized look of it on making it look sloppy. It may be best suited for someone taller. I was expecting a longer sweater but this is way too long on me. I'll probably just wear it around the house. Unfortunately the small is the smallest size, but if you're able to size down one this would be a great sweater. Read more
items.author: LH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfectly Lightweight and Cozy Cardigan
items.body: I love the weight of this cardigan, and it’s light enough to layer comfortably but still cozy and warm. The long sleeve, loose-fit design is flattering, and the open front with buttons adds a nice touch of style. The material feels soft and well-made, making it great for casual wear or layering over a blouse or tee. Overall, this is a versatile, stylish, and comfortable cardigan that I’m very happy with. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Megan and William Wethy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new snuggly soft go-to cardi!
items.body: I've been a bit put-off these days by what some manufacturers consider "cardigans", but this lightweight beauty is the real thing! This crewneck, button down sweater has classic, clean lines and is the perfect cool weather layering staple. The knit fabric is incredibly soft, but has enough density to provide a nice warm barrier from cooler temps. I chose an XL for a roomier fit since this will be worn over other tops. That said, based on the provided sizing chart, the fit is accurate. The body length for me (5'4") hits about mid-hip and while the sleeves go past my wrist, I either cuff them up or let them cover my hands for extra warmth. The cardigan is well-constructed with all seams and other stitching properly done. I love the simplicity of this design as well as the little bit of ribbed detailing down the front. Overall, the thickness and softness of the fabric and the cardigan's classic design make this a winner for me! It's priced reasonably for the quality and comfort that it provides. Read more
items.author: MW

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Has some issues. Also what is PPT? The tag lists it as the material.
items.body: This sweater is super super super soft! It's almost softer than I wish it was, strange as that is to say. I think that it doesn't hold much of a sheet, or structure as you might want in this kind of a cardigan, which is kind of a strange combination with being collar-less, where you might want some extra structure. I feel really confused about what the tag is talking about. What is PPT? I even tried to Google it but I can't find an answer. I would say this cardigan is larger than your average XL, and I wish I had sized down one. The color is as shown in the picture. For me the buttons are really large and too noticeable, I wish they were smaller. Lastly, this is not a cropped cardigan, so they should take that descriptor out of the listing title; the cardigan is regular length. Read more
items.author: Ingrid

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely gorgeous and stylish.
items.body: This sweater is better than expected. It is so cute and has the new money style to it. I wore it on a night out and got so many compliments on it. When I say this is comfortable, that is an understatement. I was out looking fashionable, but felt like I was wearing my pajamas. So soft and comfortable. The pockets are perfect size and super cute. The buttons on the sleeves are adorable and sewn on well. This sweater is a great value for the price point I ordered a medium because I like to layer. I am a true size small, this fit a little oversized so I would say this is true to size and perfect to size up if you want to layer. Read more
items.author: Lynn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love this cardigan!
items.body: I couldn’t be happier with this purchase! The cardigan is soft, cozy, and lightweight—perfect for layering in any season. The loose fit gives it a relaxed, stylish look without feeling bulky, and the button-down design adds a nice touch of versatility. It drapes beautifully and looks great with jeans, leggings, or even over a dress. The quality of the knit is impressive—feels durable yet comfortable. I’ve already received compliments every time I wear it! Highly recommend for anyone looking for a chic and practical wardrobe staple. Read more
items.author: Michelle

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red, Apricot Blue, Khaki, Green White, Navy Blue Grey, Brown White, Black White, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
